title: Book My Dinner
description: A table booking website that allows users to reserve tables at their favorite restaurants with ease.

title: YouTube Clone
description: A YouTube clone that replicates core video streaming features using React, offering a user-friendly interface.

title: FairPlay
description: An online video streaming platform similar to Netflix, built with React and Firebase for seamless content delivery.

title: E-commerce Website
description: A modern e-commerce website built using React and APIs for product data, enabling users to browse and purchase items.

title: CourseNest
description: A platform where users can explore and buy various online courses, built using Node.js and React for a seamless learning experience.

title: Bookstore
description: An online bookstore where users can search and buy books, built using React for the frontend and Node for the backend.
